titleStmt.title: A brief relation of a vvonderful accident a dissolution of the earth, in the forest of Charnwood, about two miles from Loughborough in Leicestershire ; lately done, and discovered, and resorted to by many people, both old, and young / published by two lovers of art, I.C. and I.W.
titleStmt.author: I. C.
I. W.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
